abstract: The total number of tracked units of work for the current progress.
overview:
## Discussion

For an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress] with a kind of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProgressKind/file], the unit of this property is bytes, and the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProgressUserInfoKey/fileTotalCountKey] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProgressUserInfoKey/fileCompletedCountKey] keys in the `userInfo` dictionary report the overall count of files.

For any other kind of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress], the unit of measurement doesn’t matter as long as it’s consistent. You can report the values to the user in the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/localizedDescription] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/localizedAdditionalDescription].

# totalUnitCount

**Instance Property**

The total number of tracked units of work for the current progress.

## Declaration

```swift
var totalUnitCount: Int64 { get set }
```

## Discussion

For an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress] with a kind of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProgressKind/file], the unit of this property is bytes, and the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProgressUserInfoKey/fileTotalCountKey] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProgressUserInfoKey/fileCompletedCountKey] keys in the `userInfo` dictionary report the overall count of files.

For any other kind of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress], the unit of measurement doesn’t matter as long as it’s consistent. You can report the values to the user in the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/localizedDescription] and [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/Progress/localizedAdditionalDescription].

## Related Documentation

- **fractionCompleted**: The fraction of the overall work that the progress object completes, including work from its suboperations.

## Reporting Progress

- **completedUnitCount**: The number of completed units of work for the current job.
- **localizedDescription**: A localized description of tracked progress for the receiver.
- **localizedAdditionalDescription**: A more specific localized description of tracked progress for the receiver.
- **isCancellable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is tracking work that you can cancel.
- **isCancelled**: A Boolean value that Indicates whether the receiver is tracking canceled work.
- **cancellationHandler**: The block to invoke when canceling progress.
- **isPausable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is tracking work that you can pause.
- **isPaused**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is tracking paused work.
- **pausingHandler**: The block to invoke when pausing progress.
